level.heading: Resolution of assessment, evaluation, placement, and funding disputes.

level.text: The due process procedures set forth in Chapter 25C of this title [§ 38-2571.01 et seq.], Chapter 30 of Title 5 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, and IDEA shall govern any disputes between a student's parent or guardian and the LEA or SEA regarding the assessment, evaluation, placement, and funding of a student with a disability in a nonpublic special education school or program.
In conformity with the IDEA, the SEA may not terminate funding for the last approved nonpublic placement of a student while an administrative or judicial review of a recommended placement is pending.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 20-195 rewrote (a); and substituted "the SEA" for "DCPS" in (b).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 105 of Placement of Students with Disabilities in Nonpublic Schools Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-667, December 28, 2006, 54 DCR 1134).
